result.purpose: This folder is responsible for defining repository interfaces and their implementations for managing various entities and data operations in a database.
result.architecture: The folder follows a repository pattern architecture, encapsulating data access logic and providing a clean API for data operations.

internal/repositories/action.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing quest actions in a database.

internal/repositories/activity_guidance..purpose: This file defines a repository interface and its implementation for managing activity guidance entities in a database.

internal/repositories/check_in_wallet_lo.purpose: This file implements a repository for managing user check-in logs and streaks in a wallet service.

internal/repositories/crawled_data.go.purpose: Defines the CrawledDataRepository interface for managing game registration and participant actions.

internal/repositories/definitions.go.purpose: Defines constants for database table names used in the repositories package.

internal/repositories/event.go.purpose: Defines an Event repository interface and its implementation for managing event data in a database.

internal/repositories/game_played_logs.g.purpose: This file defines a repository for managing game played logs in a database using GORM.

internal/repositories/helper.go.purpose: Provides helper functions for database operations using GORM, including cleanup of stale records and transaction management.

internal/repositories/point_tracker.go.purpose: This file defines a repository for tracking point activities in a database using GORM.

internal/repositories/purchase_history_l.purpose: Manages purchase history logs with upsert and cleanup functionalities.

internal/repositories/quest.go.purpose: Defines a repository for managing quest-related data and operations in a database.

internal/repositories/quest_pool.go.purpose: This file defines a repository for managing quest pools in a database using GORM.

internal/repositories/reward.go.purpose: This file defines the RewardRepo interface for managing reward-related data operations in a repository pattern.

internal/repositories/role.go.purpose: Defines a repository for managing roles in a database using GORM.

internal/repositories/shop.go.purpose: Defines the ShopRepo interface for managing shop categories, items, tiers, and purchases.

internal/repositories/sponsor.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing sponsor entities in a database.

internal/repositories/user.go.purpose: Defines a user repository interface and its implementation for database operations related to users.

internal/repositories/user_event.go.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing user events in a database.

internal/repositories/user_quest.go.purpose: This file defines the UserQuestRepo interface for managing user quests and related actions in a repository pattern.

internal/repositories/user_reward.go.purpose: Defines a repository for managing user rewards and related database operations.
